eu.fbk.dkm.springles.inferencer

Interface Inferencer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInferencer, DebuggingInferencer, ForwardingInferencer, NaiveInferencer, TestInferencer, VoidInferencer

    @ThreadSafe
public interface Inferencer
    Inference engine supporting both computation of logical closure and backward reasoning through query rewriting.

    Implementations of this interface must be THREAD SAFE, as it must be possible to call the methods of this interface concurrently from multiple threads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Inferencer.Context 
      static interface  Inferencer.Session
      Implementations of this interface do not have to be thread safe.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(String inferredContextPrefix)
                throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException

      • getInferenceMode

        InferenceMode getInferenceMode()

      • getConfigurationDigest

        String getConfigurationDigest()
        Returns a string digest depending on any configuration parameter that may determine a change in the entailments produced by the engine. This method serves to detect when, after a change in the configuration of the inference engine (e.g., a change of configured inference rules), the already computed closure becomes invalid and has thus to be recomputed. This method is not supposed to throw exceptions.
        Returns:
        the computed string signature

      • newSession

        Inferencer.Session newSession(String id,
                            ClosureStatus closureStatus,
                            Inferencer.Context context)
                              throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Creates a new Inferencer.Session for the read or read/write transaction currently active. Parameter writable specifies whether the underlying transaction and connection object are modifiable, while parameter currentClosureStatus specifies the status of the closure currently materialized in the repository.
        Parameters:
        id - a parameter identifying the session (e.g., for logging purposes), typically related to the transaction it is associated to
        closureStatus - the status of the closure currently materialized in the repository
        context - a context object providing read/write (if writable) access to data in the repository
        Returns:
        the created Inferencer.Session
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException - in case the creation failed, for any reason

      • close

        void close()
           throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
